Phrase: The Mist Train was being inspected and repaired under a blue sky with no clouds or fog.

Half a day had passed since the nightmarish events inside the Old Spider Castle (as we call it). At that time, Fussen manipulated the giant spider forcefully against its will to turn itself into a railway track, allowing the train to run somewhat.

The train then went back on track - we stopped the train once we found sturdy ground that did not immediately collapse or slip, and was not covered in snow. So after we had a full night's rest and our meal, the train was undergoing earnest maintenance.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Hmhmm. There's really not much repairing required even. I've only replaced some broken components, while re-covering and plugging up broken windows - it's all completely back to normal.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawawa, I'm really glad that the Mist Train is safe♪

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yes, that's what Yoshino thinks too. But it's strange that the train is almost intact after such a serious accident - What kind of incredibly rock-solid material is this train made of?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Really like to take it apart and examine it. It makes the kougyoukei blood tingle.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: We're not taking it apart, we're fixing it, okay, Miss Yoshino?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: But I understand how you feel about it. Even though we ride it every day - no, that's why I'm fascinated by the many mysteries that the train holds. It never ceases to interest me, I guess I'm a bit of a nerd myself...♪

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Ooooo~, so shall we take it apart together? The Case of the Dissected Mist Train?

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawawa. Stop it with the scary talk, let's get on with the work. We're way behind schedule - and if we don't leave immediately, we won't make it in time for the Triumphal Return Ceremony.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Hey hey, what's this Triumphal Return thing anyway? I have no idea to be honest, since nobody explained it in detail yet!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Ummm... Well, I'm sure Sir Conductor will explain it to you later, so Miss Putra, please stop playing around and help me with the work.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Eh~? I'm a bit of a clumsy bum, so I think I'll just get in the way, won't I?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: No, you won't. Here, pick up that spanner over there for me please.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Spanner? Is this it?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: What's that tin can? Where did you pick that up from?

Name: Putra
Phrase: Look, I don't know anything about this stuff at all! Sides, snow is a rarity and I'm in the mood for some fun! Let's go, Yakutsk, EAT THIS!♪

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Whoa!? Hey, don't throw snowballs at me! You may not be able to fix the train, but you're a good cook, and we can't do everything by ourselves, so you'll have to do that!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Oui oui. That Murmansk girl has been catching a lot of fish for us. We want to preserve what we can't eat as rations, so if you could help me with the processing, that would be great.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Wow, really! That's a lot of meat! It's all so bloody! Nooooo... I'm already sick of this kind of thing due to the that grotesque nightmare!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Heheh. Murmansk sure is amazing, isn't it? Even I can see nothing but snow all around here - Yet the girl seems to be a skilled hunter, so she found her prey and got them.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: So I'm going to have to enjoy all of them nicely♪

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Oh my. You're so fond of that girl, Yakutsk... I'm jealous♪

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Uh, she's not my favourite or anything. Well, I don't dislike her of course... Because she helped me a lot inside that Old Spider Castle and she's a very good girl.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Yeah yeah, I recognised that at first sight too! But by the way, what about this Murmansk girl and that Fussen? I haven't seen both of them, where have they gone?

Those two were exceptionally active yesterday - they've deserved their full-blown shut eye, not a nap. They probably won't wake up for a few more hours... And actually, I'd like Yakutsk to get some rest too.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: You deserve the same rest too, Conductor. That's fine, I'm in the mood to work. I was feeling sorry for myself all yesterday and I want to redeem myself.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Heheh. It's the end of the world If you push yourself and fail~ ...WHAAH!?
nOM nOM nOM! tHIS iS gOOD, tHIS iS gOOD! cALL tHE cHEF lADY!
i'LL hAVE aNOTHER sERVING, mY bEAUTIFUL lADY! iT'S bASIC rULES tO sERVE mORE fOOD aS sOON aS a cUSTOMER'S pLATE iS eMPTY!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: S-Some suspicious people are eating the food I've just cooked for all of you!

Name: Putra
Phrase: And what's more, this place's jam-packed - One, two, three... Too many!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: And they're blocking the train too! We can't depart, they're trying to smash the tracks with hammers or something!

Name: oOPS, wE mESSED uP -- wE'VE bEEN sPOTTED! oH nO, iT'S oUR mISSION tO sTOP tHEM!
t-tHIS iS tHE wAY iT'S gOING tO hAVE tO bE! wE'LL bREAK tHEIR lEGS aND fORCE tHEM tO sTOP, wE dON'T wANT tO oUR 'bOSS' tO cRY lATER!
sPECIAL sTEEL sQUAD...! nO hARD fEELINGS, bUT yOU'LL aLL dIE, cHAAAAAAAARGE!
Phrase: Yakutsk
Wait, what the Hell is going on? I don't know what's going on, but if you're trying to block our path, we won't give you any mercy!
